item.title: Build an Azure site-to-site VPN for DevTest
item.author: philip.fourie@gmail.com (Philip Fourie)
item.description: Integration testing in a hybrid cloud architecture can be challenging when you have to test between on-premises resources and cloud workloads. Azure’s site-to-site VPN make it possible to extend your on-premises network to private virtual networks on the cloud. Usually, such a setup requires hardware that supports IPsec VPN. Azure site-to-site VPN requires a device that is IPsec IKEv2 compliant.

image.title: Build an Azure site-to-site VPN for DevTest
